section.heading: Training.
section.text: The Office of Boards and Commissions, established December 19, 2001 (Mayor’s Order 2001-189), in coordination with the Open Government Office, shall:

para.text: Develop a training manual for members of public bodies; and
Annually advise all members of public bodies of their responsibilities under this subchapter.

annotations.annotation: as added Mar. 31, 2011, D.C. Law 18-350, § 2, 58 DCR 734
